outputs.output_descr: The Environment and Energy Global Programme work plan seeks to achieve results in five of the six MYFF service lines; 3.1 (frameworks and strategies for sustainable development), 3.2 (effective water governance), 3.3 (access to sustainable energy services), 3.5 (conservation and sustainable use of biodiversity) and 3.6 (national/sectoral policy and planning to control emissions of Ozone Depleting Substance and Persistent Organic Pollutants.
